name: MetaTrader 5 Program File
summary: An EX5 file is a compiled program written for MetaTrader, an online trading platform. It contains executable code that has been compiled from an .MQ5 custom indicator, Expert Advisor, or script source code file. EX5 files replaced .EX4 files with the release of MetaTrader 5.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
